name: Polygonal quest
description:
You are a square which got access to shapeshifting abilities and can now change shape to a speedy circle or to a triangle capable of shooting bullet-like projectiles. Your normal square form got nearly indestructible to the point where spikes and enemies can't kill you while you are a square.

Your primary mission is to destroy the evil corrupted shape that turned almost all friendly shapes evil.

Since the in-game instructions aren't complete, I'm going to write them here:

-Use the arrow keys or wasd to move around and jump;

-To shoot with the triangle, use the mouse button or the space key;

-To shapeshift, press "q" and "e";

Some things I'm working on:

-The last levels(in this version of the game, only the levels 1 to 9 are complete);

-The level 13 boss fight;

-Fixing some bugs;

Note: This is the first game I'm making using a game engine and one of my first games overall. The game is still in development state and is very buggy.
